Package jam.global

Classes containing application status information and useful methods that any class in Jam may use.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AcquisitionStatus Defines an interface for a class which has the status methods so that JamStatus can make them avaliable to all
CommandListener Listens to typed commands from the console.
Function This interface defines methods for a real-valued function of one variable.
MessageHandler This interface handles messages that are to be output to the screen.
Sorter Interface for user-written sort classes.
 

Class Summary
Broadcaster Part of a client server to handle message between packages Broadcast events to all listeners.
BroadcastEvent A event that is broadcast.
GoodThread Extends the thread class to allow proper stopping and suspending of threads, by allowing the object itself to decide when it's appropriate to stop after a stop request has been sent to it.
JamProperties This is an class that is used to get and set the properties for Jam.
JamStatus A global status class so that information is globally available.
MessageAdaptor This is an temp class that handles message that are then printed, to System.out
RTSI This utility class is looking for all the classes implementing or inheriting from a given interface or class.
RunInfo Run information, including run number, title, etc.
 

Exception Summary
GlobalException Exceptions thrown in the jam.util package are converted to this.
PropertyException Exceptions thrown in the jam.util package are converted to this.
 

Package jam.global Description

Classes containing application status information and useful methods that any class in Jam may use.
